summary: This bill, the Sanction Russian Nuclear Safety Violators Act of 2025, authorizes the imposition of sanctions on any foreign person endangering the safety or integrity of the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant in Ukraine. It specifically targets individuals or entities who have undermined Ukrainian operational control of the plant since the start of the Russian invasion. Sanctions include asset blocking and visa restrictions, with exceptions for humanitarian aid and actions to restore Ukrainian control. The President may waive sanctions if deemed vital to national security, and definitions of key terms are provided.
